name: Titan's Gratitude
overrideDescription: Deal [effect0.power] damage to the front enemy unit.[halfbreak]Discard a card at random.
cardLoreTooltips: From what Tethys has told me, the Unnamed below is not dead, but it is also not quite alive. The Stygian take responsibility for its well-being by providing sustenance, in return for occasional protection in the form of expelled energy.
